hero.title: OUTDOOR TRAININGS
hero.subtitle: DESI4FIT
hero.description: Do you want to work in small groups on better condition and more strength and flexibility? You are welcome at Desi4Fit! In all weather conditions you work outside on your sports goals.

level1.title: Personal Training
level1.desc: One-on-one personalized training sessions tailored to your specific goals and fitness level. Get maximum attention and fastest results with customized workouts. Duration: 60 minutes

level2.title: Duo Training
level2.desc: Train together with a friend, partner, or family member. Share the motivation while still receiving personalized attention from your trainer. Perfect for couples or workout buddies. Duration: 60 minutes
level2.imageAlt: Duo training session with two people

level3.title: Small Group Training
level3.desc: Join a small group of 3-10 people for dynamic and energetic outdoor workouts. Experience the power of group motivation while maintaining quality instruction. Duration: 60 minutes

schedule.title: The Schedule
